title: THE FIGHTIN' URFS WANT YOU!
body:
YOU! .. No not you, the other guy. YES, YOU!
We're the fightin' URFS and we need people to fill in the team. We need people who are available at least 2 nights a week, who are friendly and willing to work together to beat up the other guys!
Comment below if you are in, and we'll see how we go.
Also should mention that the name is just a placeholder unless no one else can think of something better.

replies.body: KK will do, have u got many people so far?
We now have 6 people. But one of the guys is a week of being able to play.
Hi there, main jungle, looking for fun not so serious team, B3 atm, but always improving
Add me on league (same summoner name) and we'll organise some games.
